bug.author: syncle
bug.description: Current master branch cannot be compiled with XCode. Testing environment: MacOS Sierra, XCode 9.2 Error message: <denchmark-code>ld: warning: directory not found for option '-L/usr/local/Cellar/glfw3/3.2.1/lib/Debug' ld: warning: directory not found for option '-L/usr/local/Cellar/jsoncpp/1.8.0/lib/Debug' ld: library not found for -lpng16 clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation) </denchmark-code>
